content.prompt: What did Qi Baishi imply in his response to another artist who wanted to learn his technique for painting Chinese cabbage?

choices.label: The other artist lacked life experience.
Qi Baishi’s paintings were more valuable than those of the other artist.
Qi Baishi’s skill was more advanced than that of the other artist.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
